lom:description.lom:string:
Each kit features exciting careers, such as urban ecology, space geology, genetic counseling, and even African plant exploration via a DVD, CD-ROM and print guide. These real women scientists are role models who will make science come alive for your female (and male!) students. Your students will see that scientists are people who are curious about the wonders of the world...just like them!
Each kit includes a DVD that shows women scientists as they are actively engaged in their work, while combining personal insights with hands-on activities for your students. The idea is for students to do science the way scientists do it, which teaches them the scientific process through fun, hands-on activities! WonderWise activities are designed for 4th through 6th grade learning levels, although we believe that the career videos of scientists can excite girls (and boys!) of any age.
WonderWise: Women in Science is an award-winning series that meets national education standards as it engages your students in science through a DVD featuring women scientists at work; related hands-on activities for students in an accompanying activity guide; a CD-ROM with a profile of the scientist, and more science activities. Each kit includes five hands-on activities designed for five classroom periods of 50-minutes each.
